channel.title: What should i do?
channel.description: Okay i downloaded Utorrent to host my server and it was working perfectly and i was so happy then all of sudden something happened now i gotta shut down and re-open Utorrent to let ppl log and i have to do that everytime someone wants to log in.. Idk what i did and idk how to fix it. Any ideas how to fix it and what i did wrong?

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @trollromance trollromance
item.description:
@trollromance wrote:

How are you porting forward?

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“trollromance, post:3, topic:244523”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=320901.msg2538795#msg2538795 date=1226882878]

Okay i downloaded Utorrent to host my server and it was working perfectly and i was so happy then all of sudden something happened now i gotta shut down and re-open Utorrent to let ppl log and i have to do that everytime someone wants to log in… Idk what i did and idk how to fix it. Any ideas how to fix it and what i did wrong?

did you mess with your utorrent…or did it just happen?

also why not portforward??

portforwarding makes you cool…GIVE INTO PEER PRESSURE!
[/quote][/quote]

w00t* routers are cool.

and try reinstalling utorrent…(just taking guesses i use my router)

routers are like cigarettes…so addicting.

Read full topic

did you mess with your utorrent…or did it just happen?

also why not portforward??

portforwarding makes you cool…GIVE INTO PEER PRESSURE![/quote]
